japanese: ビーチバレー、楽しかったね。
translation: Beach volleyball was so fun.

japanese:
ちょっと疲れたけどね。
でもらいはちゃんのおかげで優勝もできたし、
私はフー君からご褒美を――
translation:
I'm a little tired, though.
But because of you, we won, Raiha-chan,
and I can get my reward from Fu-kun%p-2;――

japanese: 二乃、ちょっといいか？
translation: Nino, can I talk to you for a second?

japanese: えっ？　なに？
translation: Hm? What?

japanese:
らいはが見てる。
悪いが日焼け止めを塗るのだけは勘弁してくれ。
translation:
Raiha's watching.
I'm sorry,
but please don't make me put sunscreen on you.

japanese:
はっ？
約束が違うじゃない。
translation:
WHA?
That's not what we promised.

japanese:
そもそも俺は約束なんてしてない。
らいはに悪い影響を与えるかもしれないだろ？
translation:
I didn't make any promises in the first place.
It might have a bad influence on Raiha, right?

japanese:
え～？
それはフー君の塗り方次第じゃないかしら。
translation:
Huh?
That only depends on how you rub it on me, Fu-kun.

japanese: なっ……。
translation: Wha...

japanese:
ねえ、お兄ちゃん。
二乃さんとなんの話してるの？
translation:
Hey, big bro.
What are you talking to Nino-san about?

japanese:
な、なんでもないぞ！
とにかく二乃、今回は何か別のことで頼む。
translation:
N-nothing at all!
Anyway, Nino, please think of something else.

japanese:
……わかったわ。
それなら３人で一緒にお喋りでもしましょう。
translation:
...I understand.
Then, let's talk together, the three of us.

japanese:
じゃあじゃあ！
私、二乃さんに聞いてみたいことがあるんだ！
translation:
Okay, okay!
Then, I have something I want to ask you,
Nino-san.

japanese: 私に？　何かしら？
translation: Me? What could it be?

japanese:
直撃インタビュー！
ズバリ！　お兄ちゃんのどんなとこがいいんですか？
translation:
Is it interview time?!
So candid! What do you like about my brother?

japanese:
はぁ！？
らいは、何を聞いてんだ！？
translation:
WHA?!
Raiha, what are you asking her?

japanese:
フー君の素敵なとこ？
そうね、いっぱいあるわよ。
まずは私と真剣に向き合ってくれるとこかな？
translation:
What's amazing about Fu-kun?
Well, there are so many things.
First, the way he takes me seriously, I guess.

japanese:
いや、二乃もなに普通に答えてるんだ！？
本人が目の前にいるんだぞ！？
translation:
What the, Nino, why are you answering so normally?!
I'm right here in front of you!

japanese: お兄ちゃん、インタビュー中はお静かに。
translation: Big bro, please be quiet during the interview.

japanese: うっ……！
translation: Urk...!

japanese:
それから、運動なんて全然できないくせに、
時々、男らしいところを見せてくれるところね。
translation:
And even though he's not athletic at all,
sometimes he does some pretty manly stuff.

japanese:
気がつくと隣に立っていてくれる……
そんな、不器用なのに精一杯、
気を遣ってくれるところも。
translation:
Before you know it, he's right there by your side...
And although he's very clumsy, he's considerate,
which is so nice.

japanese:
お兄ちゃんは不器用というか
ノーデリカシーだからねー。
意地っ張りだし。
translation:
Big bro is just tactless, not clumsy.
He's also really stubborn.

japanese:
そうね。
意固地で意地っ張りで、一度決めたら、
こっちの意見なんて無視してやり遂げちゃうの。
translation:
That's right. He's hard headed and stubborn.
Once he's decided on something,
he ignores everyone else's opinions, and gets it done.

japanese: そんなフー君が、私は好きよ。
translation: That's what I like about Fu-kun.

japanese:
（とりあえず逃げよう……。
　これ以上ここにいたら、何を聞かされるか……）
translation:
(I gotta get outta here...
 If I stay here any longer,
 who knows what Raiha will ask...)

japanese: お兄ちゃーん、どこに行くのー？
translation: Big bro, where are you going?

japanese:
いや、２人で楽しそうに話しているから
俺はいなくてもいいかなと……。
translation:
Well, you two were having such a good time talking,
I thought it'd be better if I left...

japanese:
何を言ってるのかしら？
優勝したご褒美なんだから
私たちと一緒にいなきゃダメに決まってるじゃない。
translation:
What are you talking about?
This is our reward for winning,
You CANNOT leave.

japanese:
ねえねえ、二乃さん！
他にはお兄ちゃんのどんなところがいいの？
translation:
Hey, Nino-san!
What else do you like about big bro?

japanese: ふふふ、まだまだあるわよ！
translation: Teeheehee, there's so much more!

japanese: もう勘弁してくれ……。
translation: Oh, give me a break...

japanese: 褒めたって何も出ないぞ。
translation: You'll get nowhere complimenting me, you know.

japanese:
出なくたっていいわよ。
私が褒めたいから褒めてるだけなんだもの。
だからフー君は、そこで聞いててくれればいいの。
translation:
I don't need anything to come from them.
I feel like praising you, so I am.
So you can just sit there and listen, Fu-kun.

japanese: （くう……澄ました顔しやがって……）
translation: (Urk...acting all innocent...)

japanese:
らいは、もういいんじゃないか？
こんな話、聞いてて楽しくないだろ。
translation:
Raiha, don't you think you've had enough?
It can't be fun to hear this stuff.

japanese:
楽しいよ？
お兄ちゃん、家ではなんにも話してくれないからね。
こういう機会にしっかりと聞いておかなくちゃ。
translation:
It sure is fun.
You don't tell me anything at home, big bro.
I have to ask a lot of things with such a chance.

japanese:
ねえ、二乃さん。
お兄ちゃんのこと、もっと教えてほしいな。
translation:
Hey, Nino-san.
I want you to tell me more about my brother.

japanese:
もちろんいいわよ。
次は何を聞きたいのかしら？
translation:
Of course I will.
What do you want to hear next?

japanese: もう勘弁してくれ……。
translation: Oh, give me a break...

japanese:
そのくらいにしてくれ……。
お前が俺をどう見ているのか充分に伝わったぞ。
translation:
Please, end it there...
I COMPLETELY understand how you think of me.

japanese:
ダ～メ。
私の気持ち、全部聞いてもらうまで
付き合ってもらうんだから。
translation:
Nooope.
I'm gonna have you hang out with us
until you've heard all my feelings.

japanese: 今日は逃さないわよ？
translation: I won't let you escape today.

japanese:
（こいつら、いつまで話を続ける気だ？
　かれこれ１時間は経ってるぞ）
translation:
(How long are these guys going to keep talking?
 It's been nearly an hour.)

japanese:
（時間が経つのがこれほどゆっくり
　感じられたのは初めてだ。
　アインシュタインの話を思い出すな……）
translation:
(I've never felt time pass so slowly.
 It's like they're talking about
 Einstein or something...)

japanese:
ふーん、そんなことがあったんだ。
二乃さん、よくお兄ちゃんに愛想尽かさなかったね。
translation:
Wow, I didn't expect to hear that!
Nino-san, I can't believe
you still have feelings for big bro.

japanese:
そうねぇ、もしかすると私とフー君は
想い出のミサンガで固く繋がれているのかも。
translation:
Well, maybe Fu-kun and I are tightly connected
by our memory-filled misanga.

japanese: ミサンガ？
translation: Misanga?

japanese:
フー君が付けてるミサンガよ。
よく効くお守りらしくて、
あのミサンガのおかげで――
translation:
The misanga, you know, the friendship bracelet
that Fu-kun is wearing. It apparently is a
very effective charm, and because of that misanga%p-2;――

japanese:
あっ！
それってもしかして私が作ったミサンガかも！
translation:
Ah!
That might be the misanga that I made!

japanese: え？　そうなの？
translation: Huh? Really?

japanese:
ああ、そうだ。
らいはが作ってお守りにくれたんだよ。
translation:
Yeah, that's right.
Raiha made it for me.

japanese:
そっか……。
らいはちゃんの作ってくれたミサンガが
私とフー君を繋いでくれたのね。
translation:
Is that so...?
The misanga that Raiha-chan made
connected Fu-kun to me. I see.

japanese:
さしずめらいはちゃんは、私やフー君にとっての
恋のキューピットってところかしら。
translation:
I wonder if Raiha-chan
is our cupid, after all.

japanese:
あんまりうまく作れなかったけど
効果があってよかったぁ。
translation:
I couldn't really make it that well,
but I'm glad it had an effect.

japanese:
らいはからのプレゼントなんだ。
効果があるに決まってる。
translation:
It's a gift from Raiha.
It must be effective.

japanese:
フー君ったら本当に妹想いなんだから。
でも、そういうところも好きよ？
translation:
You love your little sister so much, Fu-kun.
But I like that about you too, you know?

japanese: うっ……！
translation: Oof...!

japanese:
（誰でもいい！
　そろそろ、この地獄から俺を開放してくれ！）
translation:
(I don't care who it is!
 Somebody, please free me from this hell, NOW!)
